channel.title: Kensmart Utilities Products
channel.description: Google Merchant product feed for Kensmart Utilities

item.title: Integrated Electric Prepaid Meter
item.description: A unified prepaid metering system that combines measurement and payment interface in one sleek unit. Perfect for straightforward installations where tenants manage their own top-ups directly on the device.

item.title: Split Electric Prepaid Meter
item.description: A two-component system that separates the metering unit from the user interface. The measurement module stays secured in the electrical panel while tenants interact with a wireless display unit for convenient token entry.

item.title: Water Prepaid Meter
item.description: An intelligent water metering solution with automatic valve control. Detects leaks early, prevents water wastage, and automatically shuts off when credit runs outâ€”protecting both your property and your wallet.
item.g:google_product_category: Hardware > Plumbing > Plumbing Meters > Water Meters

item.title: 3 Phase Prepaid Meter
item.description: Engineered for high-demand environments requiring three-phase power. Delivers precision metering for commercial and industrial loads, ensuring accurate billing for heavy-duty electrical consumption.

item.title: Gas Prepaid Meter
item.description: Reliable prepaid metering for piped gas installations. Features a safety shutoff valve and precision diaphragm measurement for accurate billing and peace of mind in gas-connected properties.
item.g:google_product_category: Hardware > Plumbing > Plumbing Meters > Gas Meters
